publicHearings.title: Public Hearing for Establishing 2025 Millage Rate
publicHearings.description: Second of three required public hearings for proposed 2025 millage rate of 3.040 mills. One speaker in favor (Zacharey Humphries), one in opposition (Bob Hickey) who urged reducing rate to 2.08 mills.
publicHearings.recommendation: Staff recommends adoption of rate of 3.040 mills at June 30 public hearing
